name: Livares Technologies
tagline: Technologies explained in a better way
description:
Founded in 2009 and incorporated in 2012, Livares has provided Information Technology consulting and custom software and web development services to a diverse group of clients, including MNCs, state and local governments throughout the world.Our office is located in one of the largest technology parks in India. Our company has 40 full-time employees. Livares Autotech global LLC is our Middle East division registered at Sharjah.
We physically started our presence in Middle East from early 2018 to ensure our customer satisfaction, quality of services and support. Along with Software services we have our own IoT division called Troncart Solutions Pvt Ltd.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Fifth Floor, Yamuna Building, Phase 3,, Technopark Campus
